contract_items.content: Analyze root directory structure and file organization

evidence.content: Root directory structure analyzed: Well-organized with clear separation (src/, scripts/, docs), extensive documentation (12+ .md files), proper configuration management, and dedicated _DEV/STREAMS/ workflow directory. Organization quality rated excellent.

contract_items.content: Assess code file complexity and distribution

evidence.content: Code complexity assessed: 12 JavaScript files (~4000+ lines), large admin.js (1828+ lines) represents major complexity concentration, well-organized service layer (5 services), mixed static/dynamic architecture. Distribution shows medium-high complexity with good modularity.

Service layer evaluated: 5 well-designed services (field-config, form-renderer, form-validator, processor-profile, security-logger) with clear responsibilities, proper Firebase integration, cross-service dependencies managed appropriately, good modularity and testability.

File structure complexity score calculated: 50/60 (83%). Components: File count (25pts), Organization (15pts), Services (10pts), Documentation (5pts), Complexity penalty (-5pts). High complexity due to large codebase and complex single file, mitigated by excellent organization.
